data.actual_result: the screen loads longer than normal and no toast appears
data.expected_result: the toast 'Unable to pre-process file' should appear as it does when sending a message or text.
data.short_description: missing toast when sending file to user that has you blocked
data.steps_to_repro: - have a user block you - go to a second party application (such as messages) - share an image/file to discord and attempt to send the file to the user who has you blocked - notice the toast is absent compared to when attempting to send a text or message to said user
